About Us

Benefits

  • Room service

    Order anything from the menu and any service will be available to you at any time of the day or night.

  • Hotel bar

    A colorful open bar that will grab your attention with light and rich velvet chairs.

  • Hotel restaurant

    Star-shaped gold chandeliers hang over dark wood tables in the bar-restaurant, where the sous chef creates Asian fusion cuisine with fresh, seasonal ingredients.

  • Children

    The restaurant has a children's menu, high chairs and activity kits; Breakfast is free for children under 12 years old.

About Us

Casino hotel in New Zealand

There is Internet access throughout the hotel, and there is a 24-hour fitness center at your doorstep. In the rooms: Smart TV with Netflix, Vittoria Espresso coffee machine, T2 tea, minibar with free (non-alcoholic) drinks and snacks, free bottled water and Superfood Soak bath amenities. The deluxe rooms also have a bar, a Dyson hair dryer, a GHD hair straightener and a Nintendo game console.

The family heated outdoor pool is open daily from 06:00 to 22:00 (lit by amethyst lights at night). Order ostrich burgers, sourdough grilled cheese sandwiches, ice cream and more from a sun lounger by the pool.
